text: The Slovene Wikipedia (Slovenska Wikipedija) is the Slovene-language edition of Wikipedia. This edition started in February 2002. As of October 2015, it is the 42nd largest edition of Wikipedia by number of articles.Wikimedia list of Wikipedias and their statistics.. Retrieved 25 October 2015. As of , it has about articles.List of Wikipedias on Meta-Wiki. ==References== ==Other websites== *Slovene Wikipedia main page Category:Wikipedias Category:Websites established in 2002
title: Slovene Wikipedia
